WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

After transforming with your tool, our web.configs are running into formatting issues with a few of our appSetting key values and a regex farther along.

Before transform:
    value1="Product1<sup style="text-decoration: none;">®</sup>"
    value2="Product2<sup style="text-decoration: none;">™</sup>"
    ^.*(?=.{8,})(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-zA-Z])(?=.*[@#$%^*&"'<>!_=?:|,()-]).*$

After transform:
    value1="Product1<sup style="text-decoration: none;">®</sup>"
    value2="Product2<sup style="text-decoration: none;">™</sup>"
    ^.*(?=.{8,})(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-zA-Z])(?=.*[@#$%^*&"'<>!_=?:|,()-]).*$____

I know that this issue stems from how the .NET framework reads and saves XML documents but are there any workarounds to preserve these?
